You can track your India Post shipment using these methods:
1. Website: https://www.indiapost.gov.in/_layouts/15/DOP.Portal.Tracking/TrackConsignment.aspx
2. SMS: Send SMS to 166 or 51969 in format: POST track <itemID>
3. Mobile App: India Post 'Track and Trace' app

Tracking is available for: Speed Post, Registered Post, Express Parcel, Business Parcel & International Mail

Track your India Post item:
1. Website: https://www.indiapost.gov.in/_layouts/15/DOP.Portal.Tracking/TrackConsignment.aspx
2. SMS: POST <13-digit-tracking-number> to 166
3. Mobile App: 'India Post Tracking'

Tracking numbers start with:
• EM (Speed Post)
• CP (Express Parcel)
• RX (Registered Post)

For parcel tracking:
• International: https://ipsweb.ptcmysore.gov.in
• SMS alerts: Register at your local post office
• Common statuses:
  - Booked → In Transit → Out for Delivery
  - Delivery Attempted → Delivered

Pro Tracking Tips:
1. Check last 3 status updates for current location
2. Missed delivery? Contact your local post office
3. Delivery times:
   - Domestic: 1-7 days
   - International: 7-30 days

Investment Guide:
• Minimum Investments:

Post Office Savings Account (SB):
• Interest Rate: 4.0% p.a.
• Min Balance: ₹500 (₹100 for minors)
• Features:
  - No upper limit
  - ATM-cum-Debit Card
  - Mobile/Internet Banking
  - Cheque facility
  - Tax benefit on interest up to ₹10,000 (Sec 80TTA)
• Documents Needed: Aadhaar, PAN, Address Proof, 2 Photos

Post Office Savings Account:
• Interest: 4.0% p.a. (quarterly compounding)
• Min Balance: ₹500 (₹100 for minors)
• Features:
  - Free ATM card
  - Online banking
  - Joint accounts

Apply online: https://www.indiapost.gov.in/vas/DOP/Pdf/SB-Account-Opening-Form.pdf

Digital Services for SB Accounts:
1. Balance Check: https://ebanking.indiapost.gov.in/
2. SMS: BAL <AccountNo> to 7738062873
3. Missed call service

*Tax Benefit:* Interest up to ₹10,000 exempt under Section 80TTA

SB Account Highlights:
• No maximum balance limit
• Cheque book facility available
• Nomination facility
• Transferable to any post office
• Interest calculated on daily balance

Documents needed: Aadhaar, PAN, Address Proof, 2 passport photos

Recurring Deposit (RD) Details:
• Interest Rate: 6.7% p.a. (compounded quarterly)
• Tenure: 5 years (min 6 months)
• Min Deposit: ₹100/month (no max limit)
• Premature Closure: After 3 years (with penalty)
• Tax Benefit: Up to ₹1.5 lakh under Sec 80C
• Auto-debit facility available

Recurring Deposit (2024):
• Rate: 6.7% p.a. (compounded quarterly)
• Tenure: 5 years (min 6 months)
• Min Deposit: ₹100/month

Calculate maturity: https://www.indiapost.gov.in/vas/Pages/Calculators.aspx

RD Features:

India Post Services Available:

Core Postal Services:
1. Speed Post (1-3 days)
2. Registered Post (proof of mailing)
3. Parcel Service (up to 35kg)
4. Money Order

Service Highlights:
• Cash on Delivery available
• Free package pickup (for premium services)

• Insurance options

Speed Post Services:
• Delivery Time: 1-3 days (domestic)
• Weight Limit: Up to 35kg
• Tracking: Real-time online
• Coverage: 1000+ cities
• Special Services:
  - Cash on Delivery
  - Insurance
  - Pickup from premises
• Rates: Starts from ₹35 for 50gm
Registered Post ensures a secure mailing with proof of booking and delivery. It's ideal for important documents or valuables. Each item gets a unique tracking number.
Money Order services allow you to send money safely to any post office location. The e-Money Order (eMO) is a fast, electronic option for transferring funds.
Parcel Service is designed for sending packages up to 35kg. Options include Business Parcel and Express Parcel, with online tracking and insurance available.

International Mail Services:
1. International Speed Post (to 100+ countries)
2. EMS (Express Mail Service)
3. Air Mail (Letters & Small Packets)
4. Surface Mail (Economy option)
5. Business Parcel

• Customs declaration required
• Prohibited items list available on website
• Trackable options available
